QuestData.Title: Devastation
QuestData.Description: The coast is clear. If Rheastrasza or the egg were able to miraculously evade Deathwing's flames, they would probably need your assistance as soon as possible.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Search for any sign of Rheastrasza within the Hidden Clutch in the Badlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Heroes:$b$bIf you are reading this, then my suspicions were correct. Deathwing has found us. The egg is destroyed, as am I.$b$bThis was, actually, the plan from the beginning. You see... the egg that Deathwing destroyed was not the egg he sought.$b$bIt was mine.
